document.full_text: business at u.s. manufacturers grew a bit more slowly for a second straight month in april but their costs rose to the highest level in nearly three years, an industry report showed on monday.
document.title: factories hold up despite slower growth
lines_and_colors: business at u.s. manufacturers grew a bit more slowly for a second straight month in april but their costs rose to the highest level in nearly three years, an industry report showed on monday.
